page.title: 20THE LIFE OF A TEACHER
page.content: Mrs.Pauline Miller lives in a new detached house in S.Cheriton, she works as a teacher at Bruton Primary School which is about 6 miles from her home. She travels to school by car each day. She does not employ any help at home and looks after the house and her husband and two children herself.She enjoys gardening and often works in their garden of about 1/8 acre. She likes to have visitors to her home and entertains about once a fortnight. Her husband works as an engineer for Plessey's. They usually watch television for relaxation.When they go away,about twice a year, they sometimes go to Spain.She may go to evening classes badminton, swimming and uses Wincanton library. She gets shopping once a week locally and goes to Bath once a month. She enjoys taking her dogs for walks.
